event.title: ran a gold mining operation on the Trinity River in the early days

data.event: The community was named after Benjamin Franklin Lewis, adopted son of town founder, Tom Palmer, who, with Lewis, ran a gold mining operation on the Trinity River in the early days of the Gold Rush.
Lewiston's Online Pioneer Museum: www.oldlewistonschoolhouse.org The 2010 United States Census reported that Lewiston had a population of 1,193.
